verses.name: Hosea 6:4
verses.text: O Ephraim, what shall I do unto thee? O Judah, what shall I do unto thee? for your goodness is as a morning cloud, and as the early dew it goeth away.

verses.name: Hosea 6:5
verses.text: Therefore have I hewed them by the prophets; I have slain them by the words of my mouth: and thy judgments are as the light that goeth forth.

verses.name: Hosea 6:6
verses.text: For I desired mercy, and not sacrifice; and the knowledge of God more than burnt offerings.

verses.name: Hosea 6:7
verses.text: But they like men have transgressed the covenant: there have they dealt treacherously against me.
